footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Yanfei | Update Date: 08/26/2022 | Editor: Luno#1337

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Sacrificial Fragments__
Strongest option for Yanfei’s personal damage owing to a high EM substat. Spacing out of skill uses when the weapon passive procs is advised in order for electro auras to be maintained.

__Thrilling Tales of Dragon Slayers__
Provides a potent buff to a single party member, but mandates a structured rotation in order to properly pass the TTDS buff to the character who benefits most from it.
** **

fields.name: Replacement Weapon:
fields.value:
__Magic Guide__
Inexpensive variant of sacrificial fragments but with slightly less damage potential.

__Hakushin Ring__
Hakushin Ring’s weapon passive is extremely easy both to proc and maintain as Yanfei claims ownership over most, if not all overloads. Great multi-buffing qualities coupled with more flexible rotations makes this weapon comparable to the buff of Thrilling Tales of Dragon Slayers. 

** **

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value: Talents need not be levelled in this playstyle

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
CRIT Rate substats are to be voided in this playstyle due to her A4 applying more instances of pyro application which, although good in-theory, is not actually beneficial. This is in light of the extra pyro application instance messing up the auras on the enemy; resulting in less overloads owned by Yanfei.

Should players have neither of the 4-piece artifact sets that boost her overload damage, running +80 EM 2-piece sets is an option.
When opting for instructors as one of said +80 EM sets, it is recommended to only run the set piece on the flower and feather.
